system.availability: Scarce Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement. Failing Toughness Test, target is stunned for a number of rounds equal to their Perception Bonus. Doesn't do anything if target is already stunned.
system.cost: Good Craftsmanship can delay effect by 1 round, Best can delay by up to 24 hours, chosen on acquisition/creation. Temporarily replaces the "Toxic" Wep. Quality's effect if applied.
